about_the_game:
After a tragedy that shattered his life, the protagonist isolates himself completely. Radio stalking becomes his only way to silence the pain. But the deeper he dives, the further he drifts from reality.

Tune into signals, record them, and publish your findings. Likes, views, and money become your new currency. But what are you sacrificing in return?

This is not a story about monsters. It’s a story about how easily you can become trapped in your own thoughts and lose yourself.

Your actions lead to one of two endings. Can you stop before there’s no turning back?

content_descriptors.notes:
RADIO STALKER tackles mature themes and emotional moments that may not be suitable for every audience. The main character's inner struggles will put a large emphasis on the gameplay with central themes such as:

- Severe depression, isolation, and decay of mental health.
- Visually represented drug treatment, as the use of anti-depression medication is shown for the main protagonist in order to cope with his illness.
- Self-violence and suicide.
- Very disturbing with strong psychological horror elements. - Tension and discomfort rise during gameplay.

The above themes are deeply connected with the storyline and are of a grave nature; therefore, they shall have an after-effect on the player reconsidering it during gameplay. Potential players need to be made aware of what they will be dealing with.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / or AMD analog
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB) / or AMD analog
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Suitable for playing on low settings at 1080p with stable FPS (30-60).
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / or AMD analog
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti (6 GB) / or AMD analog
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Suitable for playing on high settings at 1080p with stable high FPS.

short_description: A psychological horror game where you tune radio frequencies, record mysterious signals, and publish your findings. Dive into a deep, nonlinear narrative about isolation and obsession, with immersive gameplay and an atmosphere inspired by early 2000s dread.
